name: Escape The Tetris
description:
Platform your way through a tetris-inspired level to escape and compete for a high score!

This game does support an xbox controller, however, it is best played on a laptop. The controls are broken up to either side of the keyboard, so you can bring a friend and one of you can play as the player and the other can control the falling blocks!

For the best play experience, download the unity build of the project and play at 1920x1080 resolution.

If you play in browser I strongly recommend playing in full screen for best results.
